query:
SELECT cm.id, cm.conversationId, cm.role, SUBSTRING(cm.content, 1, 100) as content_preview, cc.title
FROM chatMessages cm
JOIN chatConversations cc ON cm.conversationId = cc.id
WHERE cm.content LIKE '%ネットビジネスで稼げない人%'
ORDER BY cm.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 5;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user ENKfpgkx2S962Xx.root --database NYSDZ3CUp62WRWmJyXH7Fz --execute SELECT cm.id, cm.conversationId, cm.role, SUBSTRING(cm.content, 1, 100) as content_preview, cc.title
FROM chatMessages cm
JOIN chatConversations cc ON cm.conversationId = cc.id
WHERE cm.content LIKE '%ネットビジネスで稼げない人%'
ORDER BY cm.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 5;
